meanings.sent1: The group of numbskulls couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those numbskulls; they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The numbskulls thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: His head was full of numbskulls, unable to grasp the concept of basic math.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with numbskulls who couldn't even spell their own names.

meanings.definition: To make someone feel stupid or foolish.
meanings.sent1: She numbskulls her brother by teasing him about his haircut.
meanings.sent2: Please don't numbskulls others just to feel superior.
meanings.sent3: He numbskulls his friends by pretending to forget their names.
meanings.sent4: The tricky riddle numbskulls even the brightest minds.
meanings.sent5: His sarcastic remarks always manage to numbskulls those around him.
